Please check out this page and download discord-social-sdk: 
https://discord.com/developers/docs/discord-social-sdk/getting-started/using-c++#step-4-download-the-discord-sdk-for-c++

Folder structure:
discord-sdk/
  bin/
    debug/
      discord_partner_sdk.aar
      discord_partner_sdk.dll
      discord_partner_sdk.lib
      libdiscord_partner_sdk.dylib
      libdiscord_partner_sdk.so
    release/
      discord_partner_sdk.aar
      discord_partner_sdk.dll
      discord_partner_sdk.lib
      libdiscord_partner_sdk.dylib
      libdiscord_partner_sdk.so
